communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

We hereby request the following records on behalf of the Al Otro Lado #DetentionKills Transparency Initiative:

1. Any record of your agency or any component thereof creating, receiving, or being notified of a Significant Incident Report taken by any Health and Human Services official from or involving a unaccompanied minor child in federal custody (whether ORR, BP, or ICE) raising complaints, allegations, or factual material suggestion violations of any law, regulation, or policy by Border Patrol agents or contractors. 

2. Any record your agency or any component thereof created, received, or was notified of relating to follow-up or investigation results arising from an SIR described in Item 1 above.

Please not that we previously requested these records from ORR in 2019, but have yet to receive a response: https://www.muckrock.com/foi/united-states-of-america-10/hhs-bp-sirs-all-office-of-refugee-resettlement-united-states-of-america-76957/

We hereby request expedited processing of this request based on the significant public interest in government wrongdoing, as well as the immediate risk to the lives, safety, and substantial due process rights of migrant children in federal custody. 

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter.

We look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days.

Sincerely,

Andrew Free
#DetentionKills Transparency Initiative 
Al Otro Lado

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

This is a FOIL request for copies of all records, including video, audio, emails, texts, and other similar documents, whether sent from or received on official or personal equipment related to any investigation into the perpetrator Leniz Escobar and the victims: Justin Llivicura, Michael Lopez, Jorge Tigre and Jefferson Villalobos.

This request includes but is not limited to the following: missing persons report, any crime scene photos/videos, 911 calls, cell phone video, case files, incident reports, police reports, interrogation videos/audio, autopsy reports, missing person report, police interrogation video for other people involved in the shootout, and police video of arrests.

I am a producer with Vice News, this request is made for the purpose of news gathering and not for commercial use.
 
I request an expedited processing of this request as this information provides great value to public interest and thus is time sensitive. 

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Jennifer Solorio

title: FOIL Request (Suffolk County District Attorney's Office)

title: NCHS RDC VSD research proposals, 2015 onwards

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: NCHS RDC VSD research proposals, 2015 onwards
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

1. Every research application for the use of restricted-use Vaccine Safety Datalink data sets submitted to the National Center for Health Statistics RDC.
2. The NCHS Review Committee's response to every such application.
3. The list of all researchers holding "Guest Analyst" status (as per the VSD access guidelines: https://www.cdc.gov/vaccinesafety/ensuringsafety/monitoring/vsd/data-sharing-guidelines.html)
4. The list of all applications for "Guest Analyst" status (as per the VSD access guidelines: https://www.cdc.gov/vaccinesafety/ensuringsafety/monitoring/vsd/data-sharing-guidelines.html) that were rejected.
5. The members of the NCHS Review Committee since 2002, with start and end of tenure where applicable.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Chris von Csefalvay
